channel.title: Crash - C1a4b
channel.description: Keep getting this crash when the screen shakes as you come up to the scientist who is sitting against the wall after killing the headcrab zombie after the door inside the silo opens up. Tried setting everything to low and still getting the crash. Just shows up as a normal "hl2.exe has stopped working". hl2_4104_crash_2012_9_15T12_5_55C0.mdmp (140 KB)

item.title: Crash - C1a4b
item.dc:creator: Frimann
item.description:
Destroying the crates and stuff on top before turning on the fan worked for me.

item.title: Crash - C1a4b
item.dc:creator: macdaddymario
item.description:
bump. anyone have an idea?

edit: Have also tried noclipping around it and still it crashes. Kinda sucks to wait all this time to have this kinda crash happen again and again and then not even have a post acknowledge that my post has been read and is being looked into by the team. :\
